title: APT actor
extract: From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia. An advanced persistent threat (APT) is a stealthy computer network attack in which a person or group gains unauthorized access to a network and remains undetected for an extended period.
extract_html: From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia. An advanced persistent threat (APT) is a stealthy computer network attack in which a person or group gains unauthorized access to a network and remains undetected for an extended period.
